duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee day-to-day operations within the assigned function, ensuring customer service satisfaction and expectation management.
Manage staffing, performance, and development of exempt and non-exempt employees.
Plan and schedule day-to-day operations, ensuring health and safety management and compliance with state/local/federal regulations.
Provide off-shift support in the event of critical customer network disruption or crisis.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of operations, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain (Master's preferred)
